# cat /etc/xinetd.d/talk
# description: The talk server accepts talk requests for chatting \
# with users on other systems.
service talk
{
 flags   = IPv4
 disable   = no
 socket_type  = dgram
 wait   = yes
 user   = nobody
 group   = tty
 server   = /usr/sbin/in.talkd
}

```
    $ cat nicetest.sh
 echo "my nice is `nice`"
 $ sh nicetest.sh
 my nice is 0

```

```
    $ nice sh nicetest.sh
 my nice is 10

```

```
    $ nice -15 sh nicetest.sh
 my nice is 15

```
